name: Q-Base
description: I created the multipage website Q-Base to help developers identify tools to increase development quality and speed. In order to get inspiration for creating a nice user interface, I visited several sorts of websites in the same business as well as online communities like Dribbble.

name: DEE BLOG
description: I created the multipage blog site Dee Blog with an enjoyable user experience in mind. I got inspiration for creating a nice user interface by browsing many types of websites within the same business, including websites like awwwards.

name: Darkflix
description: I chose to redesign the frontend of the official Netflix Web App because I was drawn to its attractive user interface. By doing so, I had the chance to demonstrate my frontend expertise, and it turned out to be a wonderful learning experience. In order to construct a user interface that is responsive to all types of devices and uses the SPA framework to speed up the frontend, I used my frontend development tools.
